headline: How Investors Are Reacting To PTC (PTC) Winning Reditus Space’s ENOS Mk1 Onshape Government Deal
summary: On January 20, 2026, PTC announced that Reditus Space selected its cloud-native Onshape CAD and product data management platform, including Onshape Government, to design a reusable spacecraft and supporting hardware for the ENOS Mk1 mission under ITAR and EAR compliance. This collaboration highlights how PTC’s cloud-native, compliance-ready tools are being used in cutting-edge reusable orbital spacecraft projects, underscoring their relevance for highly regulated aerospace and defense...
